participant_1.background:
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
i start an internship in engineering later this year.
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
my glasses are always dirty and i can t seem to get them clean.
i am thin.

participant_2.background:
I grew up going to the beach with my family.
My biggest fear is not being able to provide for my family.
i love computers.
i paint in my free time.
I value my time the most because it is the only thing that can never be replaced.

content.text: Hello how are you doing today?
I am doing great! How are you?
I am doing well thank you for asking!
That is great to hear! What are your hobbies?
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family and paint in my free time. What about you?
I love to paint in my free time as well! I also love going to the beach and building computers.
The beach is a great place to relax! I love to build computers as well. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Rocky! He is a great companion. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Mittens! She is a little bit of a diva but I love her.
Cats are great! I love their personalities.
I agree! They are very independent but also very loving.
It sounds like you have a great family!
I do! They are my everything.
I am glad to hear that!
